_sText:
Welcome :D

Have fun with this map i have put a lot of effort to it especially the surf and climb bit.

**INSTRUCTIONS**
SURF AND CLIMB RACES
All you have to do to set up a race is to lead the Ts or CTs  to the START cage (it's perfectly safe to let Ts and Cts surf or climb together) and press the certain button on the control panel. To Recall people just press the certain recall button.

WAR
Nothing new to this. Cts are teleported on top of the cell block area and Ts to disco. Ts have 2 chances to go on the upper side of the level outside of the armory doors. WAR button can only be pressed with a CT.

Find the secrets.
